remarks: Equivalent expressions for a 1-dim subspace (ray) of functionals. (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2014.)
statement:
lfl1dim.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lfl1dim.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lfl1dim.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
lfl1dim.l $e |- L = ( LKer ` W ) $.
lfl1dim.k $e |- K = ( Base ` D ) $.
lfl1dim.t $e |- .x. = ( .r ` D ) $.
lfl1dim.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
lfl1dim.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lfl1dim $p |- ( ph -> { g e. F | ( L ` G ) C_ ( L ` g ) } = { g | E. k e. K g = ( G oF .x. ( V X. { k } ) ) } ) $.
